properties.entry: Includes (or excludes) the selected columns from input data.

Allows to filter certain columns from the input table that are then hidden in the output table. Use the buttons to move columns from one list (Include or Exclude) to the other. To briefly describe the dialog settings:
This list contains the column names that are contained in the output table. The search field allows to find column names in this list.
The search field allows to find column names in either the include or exclude list.
Contains the names of columns in the input table that are hidden in the output table.
